manifest.name: vscode-jsonrpc
manifest.description: A json rpc implementation over streams

scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "⛔ Can only publish from a secure pipeline ⛔" && node ../build/npm/fail
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.all:publish: git clean -xfd . && npm install && npm run compile:publish && npm run lint && npm run test
